Reviews.Title: “Ignore the previous review”
Reviews.Author: KEITH P
Reviews.Content: It is sad that Lisa K below chose to enter her review below, 9 months after She actually stayed at Oakwater, and wrote it about the unit She stayed in, and not the beautiul resort itself, which is what this page is for. There have been many changes to Oakwater since July 2011 and the other reviews show that. I am here myself right now, and could not be happier with the resort, the location, the facilities, the improvements made, and the unit I am staying in. It is sad that someone would go out of their way just to bring a place down, and not direct their issues to the people responsible. I appreciate Lisa K may have wanted to vent, but this was not the right place to do it. Oakwater is one of the best communities in this area right now, and I would urge those that have stayed here recently, and those that will be staying here in the future, not to let 1 review put you off.

Reviews.Title: “Love love love this resort!!”
Reviews.Author: Myra G
Reviews.Content: I loved this resort! In the past I have always stayed in a hotel and this was my first time renting a condo at a vacation resort. It was spacious and in a very convenient location. Unlike a hotel room, it had a fully stocked kitchen and I was able to cook some of our meals and save money. The Disney parks were only 5 to 10 minutes away and we were able to walk to the nearby shops and restaurants. The resort had a games room and a play ground to keep my 10 year old son busy when we came home from the parks. The atmosphere at the pool was very inviting, as the pool was heated and they played great music! The new management staff were very kind to us and said that there are many more good things to come at this resort. I definitely will book at the Oakwater Resort my next trip to the Kissimmee/Orlando area. Don't pass on this one!

Reviews.Title: “Very Happy Stay”
Reviews.Author: OttawaGirl123
Reviews.Content: We loved our stay at 2710 Oakwater Dr. My husband, daughter (9) and I stayed for 4 days. Very close to everything... Disney was 10 min away. The condo was very spacious & spotless. The kitchen was immaculate, and stocked with all the pots, pans, dishes etc. we needed. The washer/dryer was a nice bonus to have after having been on a cruise we were able to catch up on some laundry. The pool is beautiful and very big...I was happy to spend time in the hot tub after a 12 hour day at the parks!! I would not hesitate to recommend this spot to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “WOW! What a difference a year makes!”
Reviews.Author: Travel_Mommy_Canada
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to Oakwater and all we can say is WOW. We saw new pictures on the Internet and even a new YouTube video. It almost seemed too good to be true. We loved Oakwater before but now we would NEVER consider staying anywhere else. We found out that a new Management company has taken over and gotten rid of many non-paying owners. I am sure those owners were the reason so many unhappy people stayed at Oakwater in the past. Don't go by the old reviews! It is completely different now. The pool area is superb with all new furniture and even music now! There is a new arcade and spa! We were even able to book a shuttle to the airport. Highly recommend this resort! PERFECT for families!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent - New Management”
Reviews.Author: mark g
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Oakwater Resort this past Christmas 2011. I was great! We booked our condo through "GoDisneyVacation.com". We rented a 3 bedroom condo that was spacious, neat, clean and priced right. It is also located just 1 mile from Disney! My kids loved the lagoon resort style walk out pool, hot tub, water fountain play area and play ground. When we booked the condo and I read all the reviews for this property I asked Scott from GoDisneyVaction.com if there was new management at Oakwater because the reviews are so different from early last year to now. He told me that was the fact and assured me of how nice the property is. And it was. Don't rule this place out based upon old reviews. We loved it!!! Mark, Julie and Family

Reviews.Title: “Excellent family vacation”
Reviews.Author: Jasonandfam
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best way for our family to travel. Having 2 kids, the 3-bedroom condo gave us space that a hotel room doesn't offer. The pool, hot tub and kids play area were great for the time were not at the theme parks. This resort is less than 10 minutes from all the Disney parks and there are many restaurants in the general vicinity. We got a load of groceries for the week and saved a lot of money that way. No complaints at all. We'll go back for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome, pictures on internet were for real!”
Reviews.Author: Karen E
Reviews.Content: Our stay at Oakwater Resort was everything we could have wished for. The condo was very clean and tastefully decorated, felt like we could have called the place home. We were four adults and one infant in a three bedroom condo, lots of room to hang out together or separately whichever we chose. The ensuite off the master allowed us to share the kitchen and main living areas but have a separate washroom which was awesome when having four adults needing a shower in the morning before leaving for the day. The kitchen was equipped with the everyday essentials for preparing meals although we had a screened in deck off the condo and ended up renting a barbeque for the week which was great allowing us to prepare great meals vs having to eat out all the time. We found the location of Oakwater Resort to be very close to the Disney World and close to some great outlet shopping centres. We look forward to returning to the Oakwater Resort someday.

Reviews.Title: “In the middle of it all”
Reviews.Author: al l
Reviews.Content: The facility is excellent. Close to the main attractions, shopping, entertainment and the golf courses. The rooms have it all and the pool and extras are nice when you just want to relax.

Reviews.Title: “Twenty Fifth Anniversary Celebration”
Reviews.Author: rufusdNashville_TN
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay at 2812 Oakwater very much. The condo was clean, beds comfortable, nice little screened area to sit in even on rainy days. We celebrated our 25th wedding anniversary there with friends from NY and spent some time just being lazy, enjoying the pool, spa, exercise room and then days at Disney. This was our second stay at Oakwater and will continue to stay there, especially if Maury keeps making his condos as welcoming as this one was on our last trip.

Reviews.Title: “NIGHTMARE VACATION. DO NOT STAY AT OAKWATER RESORT.”
Reviews.Author: rick9561
Reviews.Content: Called Florida Magic Vacation to check-in at around 1pm but they said townhouse still being cleaned. The beds were so worn out that you can feel the spring on your back. Will give you backache. So we checked in at 4pm. Went to condo found carpets were badly stained as if pet had stayed there, both toilets running water, all pots were dfilthy with dried food still evident, lack of cutlery, no can opener, bed sheets unchanged, patio door could not lock, plates barely enough, no soap, towels only 3 bath towels which looked dirty and worn out, walls everywhere was dirty with marks, the place had not been dusty for months! No maids been there. We complained to Management, Alex but no action taken. Owner called next day and assured us that we will get new pots and pans but stayed 6 days no new pots and pans. Alex assurred us that carpets will be cleaned , toilet fixed and can opener next day. But next day we only got can opener which was dirty. The Manager was off sick. We complained to Bookit.com, our booking agent and they got the runaround from Florida Magic Vacation also. We spent most of our time calling Management and Bookit.com to resolve these issues but no-one really cared or bothered. It was the worst vacation we had ever. Bookit.com advised me that they are taking this accomodation out of their system. i wished it was done before got there! We were told there was internet at the condo, pool, but found out this was not available. Also were told by Bookit.com that these were new condos , well they were over 5 years old and disgusting. Even the phone did not work. It is apparent that Florida Magic Vacation do not care. DO NOT STAY HERE IT IS A NIGHTMARE OF A PLACE.

Reviews.Title: “Nightmare rental”
Reviews.Author: Chantal95
Reviews.Content: Spent first evening washing floors, dirty walls, sticky handles. Spent rest of interrupted vacation walking around with shoes or socks to avoid getting black feet from filthy carpet. Bedroom windows next to noisy air conditioning unit from cheap hotel next door. We had to buy dish rags and towels, dish and dishwasher soap, kitchen utensils, basic condiments like salt and pepper. Icing on the cake? Owner in legal battle with condo corporation, so we were forbidden to use the pool/gym/facilities outside our condo. We had to move out 4 days after moving in, instead of the planned 2 week stay. This property should not be advertised for rent. DO NOT GO! Previous unsatisfied renter was right. No Happy Returns here.

Reviews.Title: “Don't do it!”
Reviews.Author: LeeCaldwell
Reviews.Content: We just returned from the Oakwater Resort. The carpets were sooo dirty, there were cobwebs on the lamps, some were burned out, the phone didn't work. We called 3 days in a row to get clean sheets and more towels. Sheets came in a bag on day 4, but no towels. The pool was only open until 7:00 so if you want to swim after doing the parks, forget it! We were told they had free internet, but we had to pay for it at the clubhouse. How could they NOT have bathmats? We also didn't get handtowels. The fitted sheets didn't even stay on the bed b/c there was no elastic in them. We got tired of chasing the office down and still not getting anywhere. We thought we could tell them when we checked out how dissatisfied we were, but the office was closed at 8:15 in the morning. No office hours were listed. The location was ok, but I would rather have driven further for a cleaner unit. There is no excuse for crumbs on the sofa. YUK! Don't stay here. You will be sorry. I called the other day after we got home, and they said they'd get back to me. Sure!! NOT! I'm still waiting...they were going to check to see why our unit wasn't clean. I'll never hear from them again. It was a waste of money.

HotelInfo.Name: Oakwater Resort
HotelInfo.Address: 2800 Oakwater Drive, Kissimmee, FL 34747
